text:
, what have you done?!

You’ve freaked out your fans with your new ink, that’s what.

The 23-year-old pop star debuted a new look on Saturday: He had his entire torso covered in one giant tattoo, from his collar bone down to his chest, down to his lower stomach. The new ink incorporates past designs.
title: Justin Bieber Covers Entire Torso in One Giant Tattoo and Fans Are Freaking Out
